==Sample: Google Apps Setup==

1. 创建`SPF`记录
[https://support.google.com/a/answer/178723?hl=zh-Hans&ref_topic=2759192 创建 SPF 记录]

创建如下：
{{{
openwebsecurity.org.	2285	IN	TXT	"v=spf1 include:_spf.google.com ~all"
}}}
